titulo: Innovative construction and maintenance, with the use of new materials and techniques, for resilient and sustainable transport infrastructure
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following outcomes:Demonstration of combined solutions for infrastructure construction that achieve the following targets:At least 50% of the construction materials used are recycled or sourced from recycled materials;Reduced pollutant emissions by at least 30% considering the entire life cycle of the infrastructure;Reduced degradation of ecosystems and fragmentation of habitats during construction, maintenance, operation
